data.name: Fi
data.short_description: Thanks to the efforts of our legal team and/or the imposters & copycats` inability to continue their disingenuous practices, their websites were removed.

data.name: Fundmeback
data.short_description: This is another site designed to look exactly like our own at Payback. It even uses our colors, layout, logo, and much of our text. It’s really important to avoid a company like this, which mimics a legitimate business.
data.review:
This is another site designed to look exactly like our own at Payback. It even uses our colors, layout, logo, and much of our text. It’s really important to avoid a company like this, which mimics a legitimate business. Fund Me Back (FMB) shouldn’t be considered if you’re looking for recompense in the wake of a scam - otherwise, you may end up getting conned further.


Any legitimate concern won’t use a ‘copy-and-paste’ format when setting up their website. Steer clear of crooks by only dealing with authentic, trustworthy companies that have your best interests at heart - being mindful of charlatans could literally save you thousands.
